price: Sila kun falfala moo isinumatu hin argitanu?!
arabic: أَفَسِحۡرٌ هَٰذَآ أَمۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا تُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: afasiḥ'run hādhā am antum lā tub'ṣirūna
